data.description:
Are you ready to be a Poker Champion? - Come, look into becoming the greatest Poker player against everyone in the world. 

TEXAS HOLD'EM POKER VR is now in a row - Here, you can experience incredible Poker Live game with remarkable expressions of fascinating avatars! Look at around the lobby, choose any fittable table for you. 
Start your hand with fair guaranteed dealing, get into new Texas Hold'em Poker VR and let your aggression comes out at the live competition with other poker players. 

Now, claim Free Welcome Bonus Chips 10,000,000; Get Check-In Bonus every Day and much more benefits await if you get into TEXAS HOLD'EM POKER VR! 

Follow Texas Hold'em Poker VR on Facebook (facebook.com/texasholdempokervr) and subscribe seasonal event.

changelog.change_log:
minor bug fix
- blind list
- cracked scene

New lobby scene
 - Real casino, not cyberspace anymore
 New action
 - Changing emojis to the character's actions
 Voice message
 Stabilization and minor bug fixes

New lobby scene
 - Real casino, not cyberspace anymore
 New action
 - Changing emojis to the character's actions
 Voice message
 Stabilization and minor bug fixes
Fixed a bug where controllers did not work in some game rooms

New characters
- Professional poker players

New poker rooms
- Having a new atmosphere

Stabilization and minor bug fixes

We are preparing this and that. We'll let you know when they're ready.
Bug fixes and stabilization were done.

Chance to get more Free Bonus Chips by spinning a Lucky Spin!
Test your Luck if you can match the highest Bonus at Lucy Spin Roulette.
Let us also welcoming new dealer, she is the great fasionist at Texas Holdem Poker VR!
All Game Rooms are improved to better environment where you can feel more as you are in real Casino.

Add Communication window and Emoticons: Interact now with your opponents!
Available to see opponent's profile image: Check with whom you are playing~
Improvement of Game Lobby and Cashier UI
Starter Pack is now available. Get huge sales bonus for huge amount of Chips!
All-In Pack is added: Big Chance to rebuy, just stay where you are!
Improve the Camera movement: Feel more comfortable playing Texas Holdem Poker VR!

New Gear VR Controller Support
 - Change blinds
   : Swipe on the touchpad to change blinds. (left/right or up/down)
 - Betting/Raising with controller 
   : Swipe on the touchpad to move the bet slider and tap the touchpad to do bet or raise.

Only the blinds to be visible for the amount of chips
Quick start button added
Automatically rebuy if your chips are under 50 BBs.
Folded hand cards will disappear
Balance money info added in the game room
Progress messages and guides added

The next version will have social features and a new game UI.
